name: Amelia Andersdotter
bio:
From 2011 to 2014, Amelia was a member of the European Parliament. Since then, she is on the advisory group for the [Internet Governance Forum](http://www.intgovforum.org) at the United Nations.

She is also founder and director at [dataskydd.net](https://dataskydd.net/), and she has been involved in [copywrongs](http://copywrongs.eu/), a pan-European initiative to help citizens engage in the European Union copyright reform of 2015.
